articles.title: Asics Gel Kayano 30 brings radical tech evolution to rebuild a long legacy - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Thirty years on, what Asics has with the Gel Kayano is the sort of longevity of legacy that rivals can scarcely match. Of late, it became clear there was an urgent need for a radical redo
